# UIDocumentMenuDelegate

**Protocol**

A set of methods that you must implement to track user interactions with a document menu view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UIDocumentMenuDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

The document menu calls the methods of this protocol when the user selects a document picker or dismisses the menu. If the user selects a document picker, set the picker’s delegate and present it.

## Responding to user actions

- **documentMenu(_:didPickDocumentPicker:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has selected a document picker from the menu.
- **documentMenuWasCancelled(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the user dismissed the document menu.

## Getting the user-selected document picker

- **delegate**: The document menu’s delegate.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Tells the delegate that the user has selected a document picker from the menu.
items.name: documentMenu(_:didPickDocumentPicker:)

items.description: Tells the delegate that the user dismissed the document menu.
items.name: documentMenuWasCancelled(_:)
